email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out with a freight offer for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel we’re proposing is the MV Ocean Star, a modern VLCC with a DWT of 300,000 and LOA of 330m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Could you consider revising it to the low 50s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can adjust the freight rate to $51.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. The freight rate is more in line with our expectations, but could we push the laycan to 18-23 October? Also, can we agree on a demurrage rate of $22,000 per day? Let me know. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to 18-23 October. However, the demurrage rate is firm at $25,000 per day. Let me know if you can proceed on these terms. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for your flexibility on the laycan. We can accept the demurrage rate of $25,000 per day. Please proceed with the fixture at $51.25 per metric ton. Let’s finalize the details. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! I’ll proceed with the fixture at $51.25 per metric ton, laycan 18-23 October, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. I’ll send over the recap shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best regards, Sarah.
